title: snowflake.core.function.FunctionResource | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Bases: SchemaObjectReferenceMixin[FunctionCollection]
Represents a reference to a Snowflake function.

With this function reference, you can create and fetch information about functions, as well
as perform certain actions on them.
Attributes
Methods
Delete this function.
if_exists (bool, optional) – Whether to error if the function doesn’t exist. Default is False.

input_args (List[Any], optional) – A list of arguments to pass to the function. The number of arguments must match the number of arguments
the function expects.
